sys_ux_client_script.name: Set Filter for Account

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_e2179b80479a3110036bbce5536d43b6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Create default">17a5db00479a3110036bbce5536d43f5</macroponent><name>Set Filter for Account</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {

    //Account Filter
    if(event.payload.value != undefined && event.payload.value.trim() != ''){
        api.setState('account_query', 'nameSTARTSWITH' + event.payload.value.trim());  
    }
    else{
        api.setState('account_query', '');
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-30 20:25:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>e2179b80479a3110036bbce5536d43b6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Filter for Account</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace" source="x_876519_att_work">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e2179b80479a3110036bbce5536d43b6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-30 20:25:56</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
